comment: So far, we have claims that "explosives" have been sent to: >Obama >Soros >Clinton >CNN >various other Democrats All right before the Midterm Election. And we're supposed to believe this?
amr:
# ::snt So far, we have claims that "explosives" have been sent to: >Obama >Soros >Clinton >CNN >various other Democrats All right before the Midterm Election. And we're supposed to believe this?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (c / claim-01
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (s / send-01
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG1-of (e / explosive-03))
                  :ARG2 (a / and
                        :op1 (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Obama"))
                        :op2 (p2 / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Soros"))
                        :op3 (p3 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Clinton"))
                        :op4 (p4 / publication
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "CNN"))
                        :op5 (p5 / person
                              :mod (o / other)
                              :quant (v / var)
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (p6 / political-party
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "Democrat")))))
                  :time (b / before
                        :op1 (e2 / elect-01
                              :mod (m2 / mid-term))
                        :mod (r / right
                              :mod (a2 / all))))
            :time (s2 / so-far))
      :snt2 a
      :op2 (s3 / suppose-02
            :polarity (a3 / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (w2 / we)
            :ARG2 (b2 / believe-01
                  :ARG0 w2
                  :ARG1 (t2 / this))))
